name: Boo, the only miniature giant space hamster in the Realm : Hamster, Monk 20 / Fighter 18 / SD 2
author: Draconis

posts.author: Pan Draconis
posts.content:
« Take heart fellow adventurers, for you have curried the favor of Boo, the only miniature giant space hamster in the Realm! »

 


I’ve seen many baldur’s gate henchmen builds here, but a famous henchamster was missing, Boo, the cosmic Hamster who fights alongside Minsc the ranger.


Here some explanations of the build choices with some of the best Minsc quotes :

Boo is a space Hamster, so he's an outsider (Monk level 20).

Boo is a very fast hamster, even if he always run in circles (monk speed) : « You talk in circles, Cernd, but that's okay. Boo runs in them ».

"Go for the eyes Boo, GO FOR THE EYES!!" : Boo is here to disable Minsc ennemis with his stunning claws (stunning fist DC 45 unbuffed, 51 capped and called shot).

"Ooo, squirrels, Boo! I know I saw them! Quick, throw nuts!" : Boo is able to throw nuts for the squirrels (weapon focus : sling and rapid shot, ranged AB of 40)

"Boo is small and evasive, and there is ever so much of Minsc to search" : of course Boo is very small and evasive, so SD class to get HiPS + uncanny dodge was a natural choice.

Boo is naturally wise, he's the source of the mental stability of Minsc, so he has a high wisdom (wisdom 20).

 
BOO, THE ONLY MINIATURE GIANT SPACE HAMSTER IN THE REALM
 
Race : Miniature Giant Hamster (Halfling)
Alignment : Lawful Good
Playabilty : PVM, multiplayer. Boo is only playable with Minsc, the famous Hamster is really not suited for solo play.
Boo and Minsc are made to fight together. Boo is made to paralyse the wizards by hitting their eyes while Minsc cut them with his blade.
